Class ScorePage

      • toXml

        public nu.xom.Element toXml()
        Export the score page's data as XML data to be stored in an MPM Toolbox project file (.mpr). Be aware that the image file is linked via an absolute path! Edit the file attribute of the output element to set a relative path.
        Returns:
